entry.title: Unable to access Event Mesh in BTP Trial account
entry.content:
Hi,

I subscribed to the Event Mesh, and the plan was Standard. However, I didn't see the dev plan or any other plan options while subscribing to the Event Mesh in both regions, Singapore and US East.

When I opened the Event Mesh application, it asked me to create an instance.

FYI-Added roles after subscription 

Can't we use event mesh in trial account?

Ref:

entry.title: SAP Subscription Billing, SAP S/4HANA Cloud Clarification
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

One quick question on the SAP EVENT MESH activation for Subscription Billing and SAP S/4HANA. Do we need to have 1NN business event handling enabled for public cloud or is there any standard out of the box event messaging can be used without having to have additional license for 1NN? @stefan_kiene 

SAP S/4HANA SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Sales SAP Subscription Billing SAP Billing and Revenue Innovation Management, subscription order management SAP Event Management SAP Cloud Application Event Hub 

Thanks!

entry.title: Sap Event Broker
entry.content: I am an intern assigned with the task of exploring SAP Event broker - event connectivity plan. I need to create my own publishing and consumer application, publish it to my space using cf and implement the SAP event broker event flow. Someone help me with the proper guide to implement this

entry.title: Sap Event Broker
entry.content: I want a step by step detailed guide to implement SAP Event Broker - Event connectivity plan between my own publishing and consuming applications(Could be even be a Hello World sending and logging application)

entry.title: SAP Event broker X509 Authentication
entry.content: I have created a service binding between my publisher application and SAP Event broker event connectivity instance. Now I have to create destination configuration with X509 certificate to the SAP event broker instance and then use that destination in my application for MTLS. I don't have any api endpoint of the event broker which I can use to create destination configuration so I am stuck. Can someone help me.

entry.title: Application namespace
entry.content:
How to find the application namespace of my deployed application. For example the namespace of S/4HANA would be sap.s4.

I need this to send a event from my application to the SAP Event broker

entry.title: SAP Event Broker for SAP Cloud Applications
entry.content:
1) Once I add a consumer to an existing formation, is there any way for this consumer to know about the events that have been sent by the producer it has subscribed to, previously. If yes, then how? If no, why?

2) Also is there a way for the producer to know which consumers have subscribed to which events of it? Maybe an API or some other technical way? One way is to simply find out from the subaccount where the formation is created, but is there any other better way?

3) Explain this scenario:
Producer: DPP team
Consumer: Firstly, the order management consumes events from DPP, then the T1, T2 tenants of Amazon consume events from order management.

Where and how will the formations be created? Explain how this scenario will work out.

Please respond to the above 3 questions or provide a documentation or link where I can find answers to these questions.

Thank You

entry.title: C4C fill table within fuction
entry.content: I have a function and I want to fill the returns from this function into a table within the same function. How can I do this? It's an emergency, can you help me?

entry.title: I am unable to see all standard event in SF, how can I enable NewHire event
entry.content:
Hi,

I am unable to see all standard event in SF, Can someone please help me on  how can I enable New Hire event in SF.
